{"id":660596712,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"9 months, 1 week","timestamp":1647361739,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/660596712/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"17.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int left = 0, right = height.size() - 1;\n        int left_max = height[0];\n        int right_max = height[right];\n        int result = 0;\n        \n        while(left < right){\n            result += max(0, (min(left_max, right_max) - min(height[left], height[right])));\n            left_max = max(left_max, height[left]);\n            right_max = max(right_max, height[right]);\n            if(left_max <= right_max)\n                left++;\n            else right--;\n        }\n        \n        return result;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
